dublin_core.dcvalue: Our multi disciplinary team is developing mobile computing software that uses just in time presentation of information to motivate behavior change Using a participatory design process preliminary interviews have helped us to establish 10 design goals We have employed some to create a prototype of a tool that encourages better dietary decision making through incremental just in time motivation at the point of purchase
AMIA ... Annual Symposium proceedings / AMIA Symposium. AMIA Symposium
Just-in-time technology to encourage incremental, dietary behavior change.
